mapper.select: SELECT X.*,C.USER_NAME,C.NAME,C.ADDRESS,C.PHONE FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ_V2 X INNER JOIN TTS_SCLTXXCJ_CUSTOMER_V2 C ON C.ID = X.BUY_COM_USER_ID WHERE X.ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT C. NAME as name, C.USER_NAME as userName, C.PHONE as phone, C.ADDRESS as address, D .ENTITY_IDCODE as entityIdcode, D .USER_IDCODE as userIdCode, D .PRODUCT_NAME as productName, D .PRODUCT_SORT as productSort, D .SALE_AMOUNT as saleAmount, D .HARVEST_UNIT AS unit FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ_V2 D INNER JOIN TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJJL_V2 X ON X.FROMZSM = D.TOZSM INNER JOIN TTS_SCLTXXCJ_CUSTOMER_V2 C ON C.CUSTOMER_ENTITY_ID_CODE = D .ENTITY_IDCODE AND C.ENTITY_ID_CODE = X.ENTITY_IDCODE WHERE X.TOZSM = #{zsm}

SELECT count(1) FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJJL_V2 D INNER JOIN TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ_V2 X ON D.FROMZSM = X.TOZSM INNER JOIN TTS_SCLTXXCJ_CUSTOMER_V2 C ON C.CUSTOMER_ENTITY_ID_CODE = D.CUSTOMER_ENTITY_IDCODE WHERE D.TOZSM = #{zsm}

SELECT X.PRODUCT_NAME,X.SALE_TIME,X.SALE_AMOUNT,X.ZJCHECK,X.PRODUCT_SCGL_ID,X.DEL_FLAG, C.ENTERPRISE_NAME AS EN_NAME, C.ENTITY_TYPE AS EN_TYPE, C.ENTITY_INDUSTRY AS EN_INDUSTRY, C.AREA AS EN_AREA FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ_V2 X INNER JOIN TTS_SCLTXXCJ_REGISTER_V2 C ON X.ENTITY_IDCODE = C.ENTITY_IDCODE AND X.USER_IDCODE = C.USER_IDCODE WHERE X.TRACE_PROOF =#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.DEL_FLAG != 'Y'
SELECT X.PRODUCT_NAME,X.SALE_TIME,X.ZJCHECK,X.DEL_FLAG FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ_V2 X WHERE X.TRACE_PROOF =#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.DEL_FLAG != 'Y'

SELECT
X.PRODUCT_NAME,X.SALE_TIME,X.SALE_AMOUNT,X.ZJCHECK,X.PRODUCT_SCGL_ID,X.DEL_FLAG, C.ENTERPRISE_NAME AS EN_NAME, C.ENTITY_TYPE AS EN_TYPE, C.ENTITY_INDUSTRY AS EN_INDUSTRY, C.AREA AS EN_AREA
X.PRODUCT_NAME,X.SALE_TIME,X.ZJCHECK,X.DEL_FLAG
FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ_V2 X INNER JOIN TTS_SCLTXXCJ_REGISTER_V2 C ON X.ENTITY_IDCODE = C.ENTITY_IDCODE AND X.USER_IDCODE = C.USER_IDCODE WHERE X.TRACE_PROOF =#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.DEL_FLAG != 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ_V2 SET CONFIRM_STATE = #{type} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT X.*, C.USER_IDCODE customerUserIdcode, C.ENTITY_IDCODE customerEntityIdcode, C.ENTERPRISE_NAME NAME, C.ADDRESS ADDRESS, C.NAME USERNAME, C.PHONE PHONE FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ_V2 X LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.USER_IDCODE, T.ENTITY_IDCODE, T.ENTERPRISE_NAME, T.ADDRESS, U.NAME, U.PHONE FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_REGISTER_V2 T, TTS_SCLTXXCJ_USER_V2 U WHERE U .USER_IDCODE = #{userIdCode} AND T.ENTITY_IDCODE = U.ENTITY_IDCODE) C ON C.USER_IDCODE = X.USER_IDCODE WHERE X.ID = #{id}

SELECT C.PRODUCT_SCGL_ID AS PRODUCTPC, S.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCTNAME, S.PRODUCT_ID AS PRODUCTID, S.SALE_TIME AS HARVESTTIME, R.ENTERPRISE_NAME AS ENTERPRISENAME, R.ADDRESS, R.LEGAL_NAME AS LEGALNAME, R.CONTACT_NAME AS CONTACTNAME, R.CONTACT_PHONE AS CONTACTPHONE, R.FAX_NUMBER AS FAXNUMBER, R.ENTITY_TYPE AS ENTITYTYPEID, R.ENTITY_TYPE_NAME AS ENTITYTYPENAME, R.ENTITY_SCALE AS ENTITYSCALEID, R.ENTITY_SCALE_NAME AS ENTITYSCALENAME, R.ENTITY_IDCODE AS ENTITYIDCODE FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ_V2 S INNER JOIN TTS_SCLTXXCJ_REGISTER_V2 R ON S.ENTITY_IDCODE = R.ENTITY_IDCODE INNER JOIN TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJJL_V2 C ON C.XSDJ_ID = S.ID AND S.USER_IDCODE = R.USER_IDCODE AND S.TRACE_PROOF = #{code, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND S.DEL_FLAG != 'Y'

SELECT T .PRODUCT_NAME, T .HARVEST_UNIT, T .SALE_AMOUNT AS AMOUNT, T .PRODUCT_SORT, T .TO_SHORT_CODE AS TRACE_CODE, X. NAME, X.ENTERPRISE_NAME, X.PHONE, X.ADDRESS, X.USER_IDCODE FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ_V2 T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT U .USER_IDCODE, R.ENTITY_IDCODE, R.ENTERPRISE_NAME, R.ADDRESS, U . NAME, U .PHONE FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_REGISTER_V2 R, TTS_SCLTXXCJ_USER_V2 U WHERE R.ENTITY_IDCODE = U .ENTITY_IDCODE ) X ON X.ENTITY_IDCODE = T .ENTITY_IDCODE AND X.USER_IDCODE = T .USER_IDCODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND T.ID = #{id,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ_V2 T WHERE T.CUSTOMER_ENTITY_IDCODE = #{entityIdCode} AND T.CONFIRM_STATE = 'N' AND T.DEL_FLAG != 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ_V2 T WHERE T.ENTITY_IDCODE = #{entityIdCode} AND T.CONFIRM_STATE = 'N' AND T.DEL_FLAG != 'Y'
